医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
自闭症谱系障碍可能与大脑神经元失衡有关梅奥诊所和耶鲁大学的科学家利用被称为类器官的人类“迷你大脑”模型发现，自闭症谱系障碍的根源可能与特定神经元的不平衡有关，这些神经元在大脑的沟通和功能中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Autism-spectrum-disorder-may-be-linked-to-imbalance-of-neurons-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Autism-spectrum-disorder-may-be-linked-to-imbalance-of-neurons-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e47aa0b3-445d-460c-b0e1-69e6388177bc Thu, 10 Aug 2023 14:08:34 -0400 Autism spectrum disorder may be linked to imbalance of neurons in the brain
人工智能驱动的系统有望加快子宫内膜异位症的诊断速度数百万人患有子宫内膜异位症（一种敏感组织在子宫外生长的痛苦疾病）的生活质量可以通过采用南澳大利亚阿德莱德大学与研究人员合作开发的技术的新人工智能（AI）系统来改善来自萨里大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/AI-powered-system-shows-promise-in-speeding-up-endometriosis-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/AI-powered-system-shows-promise-in-speeding-up-endometriosis-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a41fc664-ccb1-44d5-9151-3bbff929f0f8 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 14:00:31 -0400 AI-powered system shows promise in speeding up endometriosis diagnosis
Optilume BPH 导管系统为良性前列腺增生提供安全有效的治疗美国泌尿外科官方杂志《The Journal of Urology®》9 月号上的一项随机试验得出结论，使用最近批准的微创 Optilume BPH 装置治疗良性前列腺增生 (BPH) 男性可改善泌尿系统症状，同时保留性功能协会（AUA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Optilume-BPH-Catheter-System-offers-a-safe-and- effective-treatment-for-benign-prostatic-hyperplasia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Optilume-BPH-Catheter-System-offers-a-safe-and- effective-treatment-for-benign-prostatic-hyperplasia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7573f610-02cf-4be6-a9a8-b4d4acb88148 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 13:49:20 -0400 Optilume BPH Catheter System offers a safe and effective treatment for benign prostatic hyperplasia
科学家开发出新型神经布鲁氏菌病动物模型神经布鲁氏菌病是布鲁氏菌病的严重长期并发症，布鲁氏菌病是最常见的细菌性人畜共患疾病之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Scientists-develop-novel-animal-model-of-neurobrucellosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Scientists-develop-novel-animal-model-of-neurobrucellosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c39796d-4de9-4ba9-9264-90383e5aac66 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 13:42:41 -0400 Scientists develop novel animal model of neurobrucellosis
唱歌和说话与大脑中相同的神经网络相关与言语相关的神经网络主要位于左大脑半球，而唱歌主要与两个半球的结构有关。然而，一项新的研究表明，左半球比以前认为的更重要，包括在歌唱方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Singing-and-speech-linked-to-same-neural-networks-in-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Singing-and-speech-linked-to-same-neural-networks-in-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c8bb664-228b-4787-88b5-f6060a174408 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 13:04:00 -0400 Singing and speech linked to same neural networks in the brain
肿瘤的一致性对癌症进展具有决定性影响纵观历史记录，医生一直在触摸患者皮肤下可疑的硬化区域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Tumors-consistency-can-have-a-decisive-influence-on-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Tumors-consistency-can-have-a-decisive-influence-on-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a4a1b11-5006-4726-9c2a-9534f13c247f Thu, 10 Aug 2023 12:46:47 -0400 Tumor's consistency can have a decisive influence on cancer progression
2 型糖尿病病程较长与大脑变化有关密歇根医学的一项研究发现，一个人患 2 型糖尿病的时间越长，其大脑结构发生变化的可能性就越大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Longer-duration-of-type-2-diabetes-linked-to-brain-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Longer-duration-of-type-2-diabetes-linked-to-brain-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99be33d4-9d7d-4355-87d0-309583f8fb49 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 12:37:19 -0400 Longer duration of type 2 diabetes linked to brain changes
科学家发现阿尔茨海默病的治疗靶点拉瓦尔大学和莱斯布里奇大学的科学家们在阿尔茨海默病动物模型中成功逆转了与阿尔茨海默病相关的某些认知表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Scientists-discover-a-therapeutic-target-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Scientists-discover-a-therapeutic-target-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b898250-76e3-4645-8805-3b5c20ac3896 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 11:19:48 -0400 Scientists discover a therapeutic target for Alzheimer's disease
研究检查了慢性疾病的共同遗传病因并将白细胞端粒长度与心力衰竭风险联系起来研究人员进行了一项前瞻性队列研究，以调查慢性疾病之间共同的遗传病因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Study-examines-shared-genic-etiology-of-chronic-diseases-and-links-leukcyto-telomere-length-to-heart-failure-risk。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Study-examines-shared-genic-etiology-of-chronic-diseases-and-links-leukcyto-telomere-length-to-heart-failure-risk。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af6bcde2-17d5-40f9-931a-3b7f3de879bf Thu, 10 Aug 2023 11:14:00 -0400 Study examines shared genetic etiology of chronic diseases and links leukocyte telomere length to heart failure risk
SARS-CoV-2 感染后接种疫苗与未接种疫苗的个体的炎症特征一组研究人员确定了疫苗接种对 SARS-CoV-2 感染者炎症水平的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Inflammatory-profiles-in-vaccinated-vs-unvaccinated-individuals-following-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Inflammatory-profiles-in-vaccinated-vs-unvaccinated-individuals-following-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=389316a3-bacd-478e-8174-66c5a91c63f5 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 11:09:00 -0400 Inflammatory profiles in vaccinated vs. unvaccinated individuals following SARS-CoV-2 infection
